document.full_text: israel displayed on wednesday advanced arms that it said had been found aboard a cargo ship seized in the mediterranean sea, and pointed to the haul as proof of the need to blockade the gaza strip.
document.title: israel says seized arms justify gaza blockade
lines_and_colors: israel displayed on wednesday advanced arms that it said had been found aboard a cargo ship seized in the mediterranean sea, and pointed to the haul as proof of the need to blockade the gaza strip.
